document.full_text: european planemaker airbus was placed under investigation on thursday for the 2009 crash of a flight between rio de janeiro and paris that killed 228 people, airbus chief executive thomas enders said.
document.title: airbus under investigation over rio-paris crash
lines_and_colors: european planemaker airbus was placed under investigation on thursday for the 2009 crash of a flight between rio de janeiro and paris that killed 228 people, airbus chief executive thomas enders said.
